title: The Three Stooges. Vols 24-26
abstract: Nutty but nice (1940)--Gripes, grunts & groans (1937)-- Three little pirates (1946)--Horsing around (1957)--Hoofs and goofs (1956)--Flying saucer Daffey (1958)--Guns a poppin (1957)--Sweet and hot (1958)--Bubble and trouble (1953).
description: Compilation of three videos starring the Three Stooges in some of their funniest films. Titles include "Nutty but nice" (dir. Jules White); Gripes, grunts & groans" (dir. Jack White); "Three little pirates (dir. Edward Bernds); "Horsing around" (dir. Jules White); "Hoofs and goofs" (dir. Jules White); "Flying saucer Daffey" (dir. Jules White); "Guns a poppin" (dir. Jules White); "Sweet and hot" (dir. Jules White); "Bubble & trouble" (1953). The Three Stooges consisted of Moe Howard, Shemp Howard and Larry Fine.
